TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed JournalOwnership extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies whether a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame"> uses its own journal. JournalOwnership is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.JournalOwnership%2A> property.

remarks.format:
## Remarks When JournalOwnership is F:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalOwnership.Automatic?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True, the following behavior applies:
- The hosted T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True behaves as though F:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalOwnership.UsesParentJournal?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True was set if it is hosted by either a T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True or a T:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True.
- The hosted T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True behaves as though F:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalOwnership.OwnsJournal?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True was set if:
- It is not directly hosted by either a T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True or T:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True.
- It is hosted by at least one T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True, where each containing T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True has its P:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.JournalOwnership?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True property is set to F:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalOwnership.UsesParentJournal?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True.
> [!NOTE] > once a T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True creates its own journal, switching to F:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalOwnership.Automatic?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True has no effect.
## Examples The following example illustrates a T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True yielding journal management to a host T:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True.
[!code-xml[FrameJournalOwnershipSnippetSample#SetJournalOwnershipProperty](../../add/codesnippet/Xaml/FrameJournalOwnershipSnippetSample.XAML/HomePage.xaml#setjournalownershipproperty)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Navigation.JournalOwnership Automatic = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Whether or not this T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True will create and use its own journal depends on its parent.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Navigation.JournalOwnership OwnsJournal = int32(1)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Navigation.JournalOwnership UsesParentJournal = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True uses the journal of the next available navigation host up the content tree, if available. Otherwise, navigation history is not maintained for the T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True.
